B.VOY => Before Voyage
VOY => On Voyage
DIC => Cargo Discharged
UCC => Under Custom Clearance
UPC => Under Port Clearance
RFL => Ready For Loading
DIP => Cargo Dispatched
DRY => At Dry Port
UCI => Under Custom Inspection
* asteriks report field values are in days.
{{report.filter.name.label}}
Country # Imports *Avg. B.VOY *Avg. VOY *Avg. DIC *Avg. UCC *Avg. UPC *Avg. RFL *Avg. DIP *Avg. DRY *Avg. UCI *Avg Transit
{{d.Country}} {{d.RecordCount}} {{d.AvgBeforeVoyage}} {{d.AvgOnVoyage}} {{d.AvgCargoDischarged}} {{d.AvgUnderCustomClearance}} {{d.AvgUnderPortClearance}} {{d.AvgReadyForLoading}} {{d.AvgCargoDispatched}} {{d.AvgAtDryPort}} {{d.AvgUnderCustomInspection}} {{(d.TotalBeforeVoyage + d.TotalOnVoyage + d.TotalCargoDischarged + d.TotalUnderCustomClearance + d.TotalUnderPortClearance + d.TotalReadyForLoading + d.TotalCargoDispatched + d.TotalAtDryPort + d.TotalUnderCustomInspection) / d.RecordCount | number: 0}}
Total Imports {{report.getTotal(report.data, 'RecordCount')}}
